title: 无 · 教案
description:
目标：激发学生的创意表达能力，掌握基本的色彩混合技能
流程：引入与故事分享（10分钟）、色彩混合练习（15分钟）、创意画作与故事结合（20分钟）
回顾本节课的主要创作过程和所学知识

objectives: 激发学生的创意表达能力
掌握基本的色彩混合技能

stages.name: 引入与故事分享
stages.goal: 引导学生思考创意故事
activities: 教师分享缤纷课堂的小故事
鼓励学生举手讲述自己的故事
teacher: 询问学生对于故事的感受
激励学生提出自己的创意
questions: 你们听的故事最吸引你们的是什么？
有没有什么你们想要创作的故事？

stages.name: 色彩混合练习
activities: 演示如何混合不同颜色
学生练习调色
questions: 你们混合出了什么样的颜色？
有什么颜色是你们觉得特别的？

stages.name: 创意画作与故事结合
stages.goal: 结合故事创作自己的画作
activities: 学生根据故事进行创意绘画
展示自己的作品
teacher: 引导学生思考画面的构图和色彩运用
鼓励学生进行自我表达
students: 用刚学到的技巧进行绘画
向同学展示自己的作品
questions: 你的画作讲述了什么故事？
你选择这个颜色有什么特别意义吗？
你们觉得创意怎样影响我们的故事？
如果再给你一次机会创作，你会选择什么？
differentiation: 为基础较弱的学生提供调色的示例
为有经验的学生鼓励更复杂的创作
summary: 回顾本节课的主要创作过程和所学知识
extensions: 请学生回家创作一个新的小故事并绘制相关插图

metadata.subject: 美术
metadata.description: 围绕“缤纷课堂的创意故事”设计一次45分钟的课堂，包含互动和延伸。
metadata.rawPlan:
{
  "objectives": ["激发学生的创意表达能力", "掌握基本的色彩混合技能"],
  "materials": ["水彩颜料", "画纸", "调色盘", "毛笔", "故事卡片"],
  "stages": [
    {
      "name": "引入与故事分享",
      "duration": "10分钟",
      "goal": "引导学生思考创意故事",
      "activities": ["教师分享缤纷课堂的小故事", "鼓励学生举手讲述自己的故事"],
      "teacherActions": ["询问学生对于故事的感受", "激励学生提出自己的创意"],
      "studentActivities": ["积极参与故事交流", "思考自己喜欢的故事"],
      "keyQuestions": ["你们听的故事最吸引你们的是什么？", "有没有什么你们想要创作的故事？"],
      "materials": ["故事卡片"]
    },
    {
      "name": "色彩混合练习",
      "duration": "15分钟",
      "goal": "掌握基础的色彩混合",
      "activities": ["演示如何混合不同颜色", "学生练习调色"],
      "teacherActions": ["观察学生的调色过程", "给予反馈和建议"],
      "studentActivities": ["尝试混合颜料", "分享自己的调色结果"],
      "keyQuestions": ["你们混合出了什么样的颜色？", "有什么颜色是你们觉得特别的？"],
      "materials": ["水彩颜料", "调色盘"]
    },
    {
      "name": "创意画作与故事结合",
      "duration": "20分钟",
      "goal": "结合故事创作自己的画作",
      "activities": ["学生根据故事进行创意绘画", "展示自己的作品"],
      "teacherActions": ["引导学生思考画面的构图和色彩运用", "鼓励学生进行自我表达"],
      "studentActivities": ["用刚学到的技巧进行绘画", "向同学展示自己的作品"],
      "keyQuestions": ["你的画作讲述了什么故事？", "你选择这个颜色有什么特别意义吗？"],
      "materials": ["画纸", "毛笔"]
    }
  ],
  "questions": ["你们觉得创意怎样影响我们的故事？", "如果再给你一次机会创作，你会选择什么？"],
  "differentiation": ["为基础较弱的学生提供调色的示例", "为有经验的学生鼓励更复杂的创作"],
  "summary": ["回顾本节课的主要创作过程和所学知识"],
  "extensions": ["请学生回家创作一个新的小故事并绘制相关插图"]
}

向同学展示自己的作品

title: 无
description:
故事教案：目标：激发学生的创意表达能力，掌握基本的色彩混合技能
流程：引入与故事分享（10分钟）、色彩混合练习（15分钟）、创意画作与故事结合（20分钟）
回顾本节课的主要创作过程和所学知识
AI 教学背景图：生成可投影或打印的班级背景图，让孩子沉浸在主题故事里。
开场动画脚本：30秒引导孩子进入主题的动画片段，营造情境。
课堂音乐脚本：轻柔伴奏或节奏练习音乐，配合课堂关键环节。

有什么颜色是你们觉得特别的？

stages.name: 创意画作与故事结合
stages.goal: 结合故事创作自己的画作
activities: 学生根据故事进行创意绘画
展示自己的作品
teacherActions: 引导学生思考画面的构图和色彩运用
鼓励学生进行自我表达
studentActivities: 用刚学到的技巧进行绘画
向同学展示自己的作品
keyQuestions: 你的画作讲述了什么故事？
你选择这个颜色有什么特别意义吗？

questions: 你们觉得创意怎样影响我们的故事？
如果再给你一次机会创作，你会选择什么？
differentiation: 为基础较弱的学生提供调色的示例
为有经验的学生鼓励更复杂的创作
summary: 回顾本节课的主要创作过程和所学知识
extensions: 请学生回家创作一个新的小故事并绘制相关插图

preview.prompt:
Create a warmly lit elementary art classroom environment prepared for a thematic lesson.
Lesson theme: 缤纷课堂的创意故事.
Infuse visual cues from the lesson plan: 缤纷课堂的创意故事 的课堂节奏，以故事开场、探索、共创结尾为框架。.
Show handcrafted details such as student artwork walls, organized tables with art supplies, soft textiles, and natural wooden textures.
Lighting should be sunrise-warm with gentle shadows, highlighting a collaborative learning mood.
Use cinematic framing with a welcoming focal point, medium-wide composition, and subtle depth of field.
Avoid recognizable faces; characters should remain abstract silhouettes or implied presence to ensure reusability and student privacy.
Style tags: cozy classroom, tactile materials, storybook illustration, uplifting color palette.

data.revised_prompt: A warmly lit elementary art classroom environment prepared for a thematic lesson called 'A Creative Story in a Colorful Classroom.' The setting includes soft sunrise-warm lighting with gentle shadows, creating a collaborative and inviting atmosphere. The room features walls adorned with colorful student artwork, showing creativity and variety. Tables are neatly organized with vibrant art supplies such as paints, brushes, and crayons, creating an inspiring scene. Soft textiles like curtains and cushions add coziness, and the furniture is made from natural wooden textures. There are abstract silhouettes of students implied through their presence, avoiding recognizable faces. The composition is medium-wide with cinematic framing, focusing on the welcoming and uplifting mood of the classroom. The depth of field is subtle, enhancing the cozy and tactile qualities of the environment. The overall scene reflects an uplifting color palette reminiscent of a storybook illustration.

data.revised_prompt: Warmly lit elementary art classroom environment prepared for a thematic lesson "Colorful Classroom of Creative Stories" (translated from 缤纷课堂的创意故事). The classroom includes organized tables with vibrant art supplies such as paints, brushes, crayons, and scissors. Walls decorated with colorful handcrafted student artwork of animals, nature, and abstract themes. Natural wooden furniture exudes a cozy and warm atmosphere. Soft textiles like rugs and cotton curtains complement the room, adding texture. Storytelling and collaboration are reflected with a central circular table for group projects, surrounded by smaller workstations. The light is sunrise-warm, casting gentle shadows across the room and creating an inviting, collaborative learning mood. No recognizable people, with only abstract silhouettes implied in friendly action. The scene is shot with cinematic framing, warm uplifting colors, and a medium-wide composition with subtle depth of field to focus on the detailed, inspiring environment. The overall aesthetic is similar to a comforting storybook illustration, with tactile materials and a vibrant decorative color palette.

data.revised_prompt: Create a warmly lit elementary art classroom environment prepared for a thematic lesson titled 'Vibrant Stories of the Classroom' (缤纷课堂的创意故事). The room is infused with visual cues related to the lesson plan, featuring an engaging rhythm of storytelling, exploration, and collaborative creation. The classroom has an inviting ambiance with wooden textures used on furniture, walls, and shelves. The walls are lined with vibrant handcrafted student artwork. Tables are organized neatly with art supplies like colorful paper, brushes, paints, and markers. Soft textiles, such as warm rugs and cozy cushions, are spread around the room to add an uplifting and tactile touch. The lighting is sunrise-warm with natural sunlight streaming through large windows, creating gentle shadows that enhance the collaborative learning atmosphere. The scene uses cinematic framing with a medium-wide composition and subtle depth of field, drawing attention to the details while maintaining privacy by showing only abstract silhouettes or implied presence of characters. The style embodies a storybook illustration, a cozy classroom feeling, and an uplifting color palette.
